description: This is a React component-based page for managing and viewing details about a specific connection, including containers, items, item details, and raw JSON data. It includes data fetching with SWR, UI components for listing and detail views, and navigation controls.

methods.name: envelopeFetcher
methods.description: A generic fetch function that retrieves JSON data and normalizes wrapped envelope responses, throwing errors on failure.

methods.name: ContainersList
methods.description: React component to list containers associated with a connection.

methods.name: ItemsPanel
methods.description: React component providing a search, create item, and list view of items within a connection container.

methods.name: ItemOpenButton
methods.description: Button component to open a specific item detail view by updating URL parameters.

methods.name: ItemDetail
methods.description: Component to display details and comments for a selected item, with capabilities to add comments.

methods.name: RawJson
methods.description: Component to display raw JSON data of the connection object.

methods.name: ConnectionDetailPage
methods.description: Main page component controlling navigation and rendering of connection, containers, items, item detail, and raw JSON views.
